title: Lincoln's WARNING #100060: AI Safety Summit Results
script: AI Safety Summit Results... Another headline, another cycle. Bread and circuses for the digital age. Feed 'em outrage, keep 'em scrolling, harvest the data, sell it to the highest bidder. You ain't the customer, you the CROP. Bitcoin below. Listen up. AI Safety Summit Results... another distraction from the real theft. While you panic, they're laughing to the bank. Wake up. Bitcoin below.
